## Requirements

- WSJT-X installed on your computer  
- Transceiver connected via soundcard or interface  
- Time synchronization (NTP or GPS)  

## Setup Steps

1. Open WSJT-X and go to **Settings > Radio**.  
2. Configure your transceiver type and CAT control settings.  
3. Go to **Settings > Audio** and select your input/output devices.  
4. Set your location (Grid Square) in **Settings > General**.  
5. Test reception with the **Monitor** button and verify signals.  

### Tips

- Ensure your computer clock is accurate within 1 second for FT8.  
- Adjust transmit power carefully to avoid interference.  
- Keep logs to track contacts efficiently.
